DataElement.preferredName: Severe Allergic Reaction Occurrence Yes No Indicator
DataElement.preferredDefinition: A yes/no question that asks whether the participant reported any signs of a severe allergic reaction.

DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: Intensely bad or unpleasant in degree, quality or extent._An immune response that occurs following re-exposure to an innocuous antigen, and that requires the presence of existing antibodies against that antigen. This response involves the binding of IgE to mast cells, and may worsen with repeated exposures._An instance of something happening, such as an event or incident.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: Intensely bad or unpleasant in degree, quality or extent.:An immune response that occurs following re-exposure to an innocuous antigen, and that requires the presence of existing antibodies against that antigen. This response involves the binding of IgE to mast cells, and may worsen with repeated exposures.

Concepts.definition: Intensely bad or unpleasant in degree, quality or extent.

An immune response that occurs following re-exposure to an innocuous antigen, and that requires the presence of existing antibodies against that antigen. This response involves the binding of IgE to mast cells, and may worsen with repeated exposures.

Property.preferredDefinition: Occurrence; an instance of something happening.

Concepts.definition: An instance of something happening, such as an event or incident.

DataElementConcept.changeDescription: 2/6/2017 created for DCP NWU SVAR, wz.

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: The preferred Value Domain to indicate a question with permissible values of yes/no.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

ValueMeaning.administrativeNotes: 2022.12.28 Alt VM added per ticket request CADSR0001837. aj

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The affirmative response to a question.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Conceptual domain that includes value meanings to be used for Indicator Value Meanings such as Yes, No, Unknown, No Applicable

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: A caDSR representation term that is used to indicate a question with permissible values of yes/no

Concepts.definition: A response or indicator that can have a value of either yes or no.

RepresentationTerm.changeDescription: 10.3.20 TL changed WFS from RETIRED PHASED OUT to RETIRED ARCHIVED. Changed Workflow Status DBW 04-27-2016

ValueDomain.changeDescription: 8/29/17 tt added CSI per Round 5 finalization task. 3/12/17 jk added Standard reg status; ownership transfered from CTEP to NCI Standards with concurrence of CTEP/Brian Campbell. jk

ReferenceDocuments.name: DCP CRF Question
ReferenceDocuments.description: Did the participant report experiencing signs of a severe allergic reaction: hives, a fast heartbeat, dizziness, weakness, difficulty breathing, or swelling of the face and throat?

ReferenceDocuments.name: Did the participant report ex
ReferenceDocuments.description: Did the participant report experiencing signs of a severe allergic reaction?
